post.description: Query equipment type for Customer's Customer OID and applies equipment_type logic to return the real trailer type from an inputkeyword. Can generate No go event(that not is saved to exception list) if is defined for that input keyword

post.description:
Check if the input has any type of restriction(NO GO) and returns it as events
If an event is emitted, also an exception report will be created and their OID returned
Check if the input has a fixed price and returns it
Check if the customer_oid has flags and returns it
Send email notification to customer's customer email

require_linehaul.title: Require Linehaul
require_linehaul.description: When the value of "True" is set, the validation process will check whether the calculated output contains a LineHaul rate. If the LineHaul rate is not present, the validation will fail.
